sourcesContent:
<template>
	<VCalendar
		:locale="locale"
		:initial-page="initial_page"
		:attributes="attributes"
		:disabled-dates="disabledDates"
		:rows="rows"
		borderless
		expanded
		:is-dark="theme === 'dark'"
		class="mb-3 my-calendar"
		@dayclick="dayclick"
	/>
</template>

<script setup>
import { computed, ref } from 'vue';
import { useStore } from 'vuex';

const store = useStore();

const { rows, attributes, initial_page, disabledDates } = defineProps({
	rows: Number,
	attributes: Array,
	initial_page: Object,
	disabledDates: Object,
});

const emit = defineEmits(['click']);

const locale = computed(() => store.state.Auth.locale);
const theme = computed(() => store.state.Auth.theme);

function dayclick(day) {
	return emit('click', day);
}
</script>

<style>
.vc-product-pink {
	--vc-accent-50: #fdf0f2;
	--vc-accent-100: #f8c8d1;
	--vc-accent-200: #f4a4b2;
	--vc-accent-300: #f08396;
	--vc-accent-400: #ec657c;
	--vc-accent-500: #e84762;
	--vc-accent-600: #e52c4b;
	--vc-accent-700: #db1b3b;
	--vc-accent-800: #c51835;
	--vc-accent-900: #b11630;
}

.vc-popover-content.vc-nav-popover-container,
.vc-popover-content.vc-nav-popover-container .vc-nav-title {
	background-color: white;
	color: black;
}

.vc-popover-content.vc-nav-popover-container button.vc-focus {
	background-color: white;
}

.my-calendar .vc-weekdays {
	background-color: #e84762;
	color: white;
}

.my-calendar .vc-weeks {
	background: transparent;
}
.my-calendar .vc-weekday {
	color: white;
}

.my-calendar .vc-day {
	border: 1px solid rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
	margin: 1px;
	padding: 2px 0;
}

.my-calendar .vc-highlight {
	border-radius: 0;
	border: 1px solid rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
	bottom: 0;
}

.my-calendar .vc-day-content:hover {
	background-color: yellow;
	border-radius: 4px;
	border: 1px solid #e84762;
	box-shadow: 0px 0px 0px 1px #ec657c, inset 0px 0px 0px 1px #ec657c,
		0px 0px 5px 2px #ec657c, inset 0px 0px 5px 2px #ec657c;
}

.my-calendar .vc-dot {
	position: absolute;
	bottom: 3px;
}

.my-calendar .vc-dot.fertile {
	box-shadow: 0px 0px 0px 1px #db1b3b, inset 0px 0px 0px 1px #db1b3b,
		0px 0px 4px 2px #db1b3b, inset 0px 0px 4px 2px #db1b3b;
	width: 3px;
	height: 3px;
}

.my-calendar .vc-dot.notes {
	background-color: transparent;
	background-image: url('../assets/clip.png');
	background-repeat: no-repeat;
	background-position: center;
	background-size: cover;
	border-radius: 0;
	width: 10px;
	height: 10px;
	right: 0;
	top: 0;
}

.my-calendar .vc-dot.ovulation {
	background-color: #f08396;
	width: 10px;
	height: 10px;
	margin-bottom: -3px;
}

.my-calendar .vc-dot.protected {
	left: 2px;
	bottom: 2px;
	background-color: transparent;
	background-image: url('../assets/heart.png');
	background-repeat: no-repeat;
	background-position: center;
	background-size: cover;
	width: 10px;
	height: 8px;
	border-radius: 0;
}

.my-calendar .vc-dot.unprotected {
	left: 0;
	bottom: 0;
	background-color: transparent;
	background-image: url('../assets/heart-contur.png');
	background-repeat: no-repeat;
	background-position: center;
	background-size: cover;
	width: 10px;
	height: 8px;
	border-radius: 0;
}

.my-calendar,
.my-calendar.vc-dark {
	background: transparent;
}

.my-calendar button.vc-arrow,
.my-calendar.vc-dark button.vc-arrow {
	background: transparent;
}

.my-calendar.vc-dark .vc-base-icon {
	background-color: transparent;
}

.my-calendar.vc-dark .vc-weekdays {
	background-color: #059669;
}

.my-calendar .vc-weeks,
.my-calendar.vc-dark .vc-weeks {
	padding: 0;
	background-color: white;
	color: black;
}
</style>
